☀️ A rooftop evening to celebrate summer!

Ready to unwind after work? Join us for a special summer afterwork event in the heart of the city! This is your chance to connect with professionals, creatives, and friends in a chill and festive atmosphere. 🎶

Enjoy sunset views from the rooftop, refreshing cocktails, food trucks, and a live DJ set that'll keep the good vibes going all evening. Whether you're here to network, relax, or just dance a little — everyone’s welcome! 🥂

✨ What to expect:

  • Music & DJ sets
  • Rooftop bar and chill zones
  • Food trucks on-site

🎟 Tickets:

Standard Entry – €0

Perfect for those who just want to drop by, enjoy the vibe, and grab a drink.

Includes:

  • Entry to the event
  • 1 free drink token
  • Access to the general area and music

Premium Entry – €15

Ideal if you plan to stay longer and want a few extras to fully enjoy the evening.

Includes:

  • Entry + 3 drink tokens
  • 1 free meal from the food truck

Don’t miss out! 🎉

🚀 2 full days of ideas, insights & innovation

Innovation Days 2025 brings together leaders, creators, and changemakers to explore the future of business, tech, and sustainability. 📈

You'll experience inspiring keynotes, choose from hands-on workshops, and attend interactive panel discussions on cutting-edge topics — from AI and circular economy to digital transformation and product design. 💡

Connect with professionals from across industries, discover new solutions, and leave with practical insights to take back to your teams. The event wraps up with a networking session and innovation showcase. 🤝

🎯 Highlights include:

  • Thought-provoking talks & panels
  • Themed workshops (choose your track!)
  • Swag bag & lunch (with Full Experience ticket)
  • End-of-day networking session

Let’s shape the future together! 🌍
